New Records: C Zimbabwe's win marked their first T20I victory against India in eight years; India's first loss in 2024 T20Is
Key Match Events: C Zimbabwe bowled India out for 102; India were reduced to 28/4 in the Powerplay
Pre-Game Insights: Zimbabwe planned to exploit home conditions; Masakadza aimed to dismiss key Indian players like Shubman Gill
Post-Match Reflections: The win was significant for Zimbabwe's cricket; Raza aimed to use this series for IPL prospects
Miscellaneous Highlights: Harare's winter conditions affected batting; Zimbabwe's series victory would be a boost
